text: Patrick "Pat" Rafter (born 28 December 1972) is a retired professional tennis player from Australia. He was once ranked number one in the world. Rafter won the US Open in 1997 and 1998. He also reached and lost the 2000 and 2001 Wimbledon finals to Pete Sampras and Goran Ivanišević respectively. == Other websites == * Category:1972 births Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:Australian tennis players Category:Australian of the Year Award winners Category:Olympians for Australia Category:Australian Open champions Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Queensland Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: Patrick Rafter
